@dualed - conversion k = k + str would NEVER cause a Lua error if str was extracted by %d+ pattern. For very long str it would simply return NaN (namely, 1.#INF) without raising any Lua error.
Keep in mind that tonumber() can catch failed string-to-number conversions while str+k would cause a Lua error.
